ygData.subject: Re: Jewelcrafting and an idea
ygData.msgSnippet: If you try one topaz and one silver bar you get you dont have the proper mix or something like that. My best guess is one need more than one bar ... a single
ygData.messageBody:
If you try one topaz and one silver bar you get "you dont have the proper
mix" or something like that. My best guess is one need more than one bar
